"Hmmmm... Where is it?": "Hey peon! Yes, you there! Peon, have you seen that rumored, uh, thing here?"
"You don't know what I mean? That thing! You should know what that is, right!?"
"As a member of the Council of Six, you should tell me what I need to know, peon."
"That thing is really big and really powerful, right!?"
"Plus, I've heard it can tear space! There's only one other person I know of who can do that!"
"Wow, it would be so nice. I would love to be able to fight it!"
"So if you see it, report it to me immediately, okay?"
"How to report? Like I care. Shout as loud as you can, like an idiot. Anyways, later peon!"
